price: Ɔno na Wayε anadwo akatasoͻ ama mo, εna (Wayε) nna nso ahomegyeε, εna Wayε adekyeε nso a (mode) sͻreε (tesε deε obi asͻre afiri owuo mu).
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلَّيۡلَ لِبَاسٗا وَٱلنَّوۡمَ سُبَاتٗا وَجَعَلَ ٱلنَّهَارَ نُشُورٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wahuwa alladhī jaʿala lakumu al-layla libāsan wal-nawma subātan wajaʿala al-nahāra nushūran
